price: Anaafi nama haasa'a (Qur'aana) kana sobsiisu walitti nu dhiisi; Nuti suutaan karaa isaan hin beekne irraa isaan qabna.
arabic: فَذَرۡنِي وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِۖ سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fadharnī waman yukadhibu bihādhā al-ḥadīthi sanastadrijuhum min ḥaythu lā yaʿlamūna
